name: Coffee Maker - Homemade Drink Making Game
name_original: Coffee Maker - Homemade Drink Making Game
description:
Are you a coffee pro or a coffee noob? Don't worry! With Make Coffee – Cafe Shop, you'll learn the whole process and be a professional barista in no time! This game teaches you how to make a cup of coffee through each fun activity, giving you the skills you need to make yummy coffee the next time you need a coffee break! Grind the beans, set up the machine, brew the coffee, then serve customers as they order each drink. The more you make, the better you'll get, and you'll be the best cafe in town!
Product Features:
Easy to use controls for kids to play.
Fun cafe game where kids learn to make and serve coffee.
Become a barista by learning all aspects of coffee making with each fun activity.
Make coffee drinks and decorate them!
Fulfill the orders of each customer on their coffee break.
Serve hot, yummy drinks to customers in your cafe.
How to Play:
Use interactive controls to play the game.
Learn how to make coffee through each fun activity in the cafe.
Become a professional barista and serve drinks to customers on their coffee break.
Please Note that this game is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To disable this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content".
